Source.Name: perl-alien-sdl
Source.Summary: Building, finding and using SDL binaries
Source.Description: In short Alien::SDL can be used to detect and get configuration settings from an installed SDL and related libraries. Based on your platform it offers the possibility to download and install prebuilt binaries or to build SDL & co. from source codes.

Package.Name: perl-alien-sdl
